meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sordid.
meanings.sent1: The sordidness of the situation was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the sordidness of the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The sordidness of the situation almost made her laugh in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: The sordidness of the city streets mirrored the corruption within.
meanings.sent5: The sordidness of the abandoned house sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.sent1: The sordidness of his actions left a stain on his reputation.
meanings.sent2: The sordidness of the deal was exposed by the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The sordidness of the gossip made the whole situation feel like a soap opera.
meanings.sent4: The sordidness of the betrayal cut deeper than expected.
meanings.sent5: The sordidness of the scandal was splashed across the headlines.
